'''Mora Chests'''<ref>HoYoLAB: [https://www.hoyolab.com/article/38381823 A Further Upgrade to the Treasure Compass and Batch Deletion of Map Pins | Developers Discussion — 04/23/2025]</ref> are objects that contain [[Mora]]. When [[Investigation|investigated]], they will yield a random amount of Mora and count towards [[Map|exploration progress]].

Several variants of Mora Chests exist: Wooden Crates<ref>Official Interactive Map: [https://webstatic-sea.mihoyo.com/app/ys-map-sea/index.html#/map/2?shown_types=129 Teyvat]</ref>, which exist in every region and are found on bodies of water; and other variants, which are usually associated with a specific region and found on land.

==Drop Rate==
===Wooden Crates===
The Mora drop of Wooden Crates are split into 3 separate rolls, which may result in 500, 1000, or 1500 Mora. Wooden Crates in [[Liyue]] also yield two [[Geo Sigil]]s.
